testcase.name: verifyKeyAndValueInaMap

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path prefs.backgroundImageScaled.findAll{ it.width == 109 } doesn't match. Expected: (a collection containing map containing ["width"-><108>]) Actual: <[]>
